concept.title: Content protection
concept.shortdesc: You can use the features of the Primetime Digital Rights Management (DRM) system to provide secure access to your video content. Alternatively, you can use third-party DRM solutions as an alternative to Adobe's integrated Primetime DRM solution.

conbody.p: Check with your Adobe representative for the most up-to-date information on the availability of 3rd-party DRM solutions.
